questions.text: Hey {{name}}, I’m Nelson, your accountability support partner. Before we start building together, I'd like to understand where you’re at today and what you intend to achieve. No judgment, just facts and a realistic plan tailored to you. Sound good?
Excellent!  So tell me, what's your primary desired change?  What brings you here today?

options.label: Not sure, I just need change

questions.text: Honesty is our first policy. Truth isn't always pretty, but it's the baseline for our work together. So tell me, which best describes how you usually eat?

options.label: Structured meals with protein and some veggies

questions.text: How active have you been over the last few months?
